Package org.xmlserializer4j

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObjectReferenceContext  
    OnReferenceListener
    Interface for listening for references.
    TypeSerializer<T>
    Interface for implementing type serializers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsObjectReferenceContext
    Abstract ObjectReferenceContext implementation.
    AbsSerializer<T>  
    ArraySerializer  
    BooleanSerializer  
    CalendarSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Calendar objects.
    CharSequenceSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing CharSequence implementations.
    ClassSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Class objects.
    DateSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Date objects.
    DefaultSerializer
    Default AbsSerializer implementation for serializing objects.
    EntrySerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Map.Entry implementations.
    FileSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing File objects.
    HashCodeReferenceContext
    Experimental AbsObjectReferenceContext implementation that references to objects using their hashcodes.
    IdReferenceContext
    AbsObjectReferenceContext implementation that references to objects with incrementing object id's.
    IterableSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Iterable implementations.
    MapSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Map implementations.
    MathContextSerializer  
    NumberSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing Number objects.
    PatternSerializer
    TypeSerializer implementation for serializing Pattern objects.
    SerializerEntry
    Entry class for assigning a TypeSerializer implementation to a Class type.
    URISerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing URI objects.
    URLSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing URL objects.
    UUIDSerializer
    AbsSerializer implementation for serializing UUID objects.
    XMLSerializer
    XML serializer class that encodes Java objects into XML representations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    XMLSerializeException
    Signals that a serialization error has occurred.
